header.title: About Working Here
header.text: We are so excited and proud of our product. It's really easy to create a landing page.

services.title: Health & Wellness
services.text: Full health coverage for you and your family, and a $150 monthly fitness reimbursement.

services.title: Learning & Development
services.text: Receive $500 annually towards a personal development opportunity of your choice.

services.title: Parental Leave
services.text: Full health coverage for you and your family, and a $150 monthly fitness reimbursement.

services.title: Work Remotely
services.text: A remote job is one that is done away from the office in a remote location, at any time of day.
